take a chair, 相当于 Sit down 坐下：take the chair开始开会

46. recpie，accept
I receive 收到某一东西，但不一定接受 ; accept 接受
T reived a gift.but I didnt accept ct.
47. wear , put on，dress
wear 和 dress 表状态，wear 接衣服等，可用进行时 ; dress 接人
be dressed in，pict on表动作.lt,s cold autside;Put on your warm clathes
48. listen，hear
listen 强调动作 ; hear 强调结果 I listened,but I heard nothing
49. throw to.throw at
throw to 扔到…;i throw at 朝.…扔.He throw a  stone at me.
	50:in chatge of，in the chatge.of
in charge of管理，负责照料;in the charge of由..照料
He is in charge of the mater. The matter is in the charge of her
51. in class，in the class
in class 在课上：in the class在班级里
He is the best stuolent in the closs.
52. on fire，on the fire
on fire 着火 ; on the fire在火上
Put the food on the fire. The house is on fire.
53. out of question , out of the question.
out of question豪无疑问的；out of the guestion不可能的
	54.a second，the second
a second 又一，再一；the  second 第 He won the second prize.
55. by day，by the day
by day 白天;by the day 按天计算. The workers are paid by the day.
